item.title: 562 other player say what i want
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:5, topic:357030”]ok thank you, its nice, i got a lil problem, when theres a space, it stop at the space.

example : i enter the command say lol lol lol

the other players say only lol.

if u know how to fix it, thank you. if u dont know its ok the command is still nice :D[/quote]

Ah erm, I know.

    if(cmd[0].equals("yell")) {
        for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
            if (pl != null) {
                //pl.animate(3636); - OPTIONAL..
                pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
                String s = "";
                for(int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
                {
                     s += cmd[i] + " "; 
                }
                pl.forceChat(s);
             }
         }
    }

Try this.

item.title: 562 other player say what i want
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Oh, my bad!

    if(cmd[0].equals("yell")) {
        for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
            if (pl != null) {
                //pl.animate(3636); - OPTIONAL..
                pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
                pl.forceChat(cmd[1]);
             }
         }
    }

This should work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

yeah ik but…
i want to change it like yell but it dont yell a message, the other player say the words after the command…
example : i enter the command : say lol.

all the other players say lol.

i enter the command : say hi

all the other players say hi.

help me please?

item.title: 562 other player say what i want
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Hi, ive tryied some 562 source and all the source got something like this :

if(cmd[0].equals("join")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.animate(2414); pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true); pl.forceChat("Join FinalCreed 562 Today!"); } } }

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“runeheat”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>RuneHeat [562] Is The fucking best!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

or

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“xap”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>xap Fucking Owns… You Mother Fuckers! He Coded Your Ass!<img=1>");
}
}

				}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“lol”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>roflmaolallalla<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“guthix”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2108);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>guuuuthiiiiix!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“joinnow”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>So Join Us In This Amazing Server Today!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“dance”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>dance!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“jackoff”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(3636);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>Lets all jackoff! WEWT!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

but how do i change it to make other people what i want? like i write say lol in the console, all other players say lol…?

Thank You!
